param.name: fusion_item_subtext
param.label: Subtext Line
param.description: You can put a second line here

param.name: fusion_customclass
param.label: Custom CSS Class
param.description: A Custom CSS class that can be assigned to this item

param.name: fusion_columns
param.label: Columns of Child Items
param.description: How many columns should display for children of this menu item

param.name: fusion_distribution
param.label: Item Distribution
param.description: You can choose to distribute child items 'evenly' or 'in-order'. For example, 7 items in 3 columns distributed evenly is: 3,2,2, in order it's 3,3,1

param.name: fusion_dropdown_width
param.label: Drop-Down Width (px)
param.description: width of any dropdown column in px, eg: 400

param.name: fusion_children_group
param.label: Group Child Items
param.description: Select this to group children under menu item rather than treating as a submenu

param.name: fusion_children_type
param.label: Child Item Type
param.description: Select this to group children under menu item rather than treating as a submenu
